content: written pattern https //daisyfarmcrafts com/single-crochet-chevron-blanket-in-min/ video tutorial https //www youtube com/watch v=pg4sn6l8t7y *i like a pointy chevron peak so here is a version of a simple pattern i tweaked a bit to achieve this look * the original pattern calls for 5 skeins of i love this cotton in mint and dove and 7 skeins i love this cotton in white the pom-poms in the photo are not part of the original pattern
